Package ohos.aafwk.ability.assistance

Class AbilityAgent

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.aafwk.ability.assistance.AbilityAgent

  • public class AbilityAgent
extends Object
    Provides methods to listen for the lifecycle of and send messages to the peer ability. After your application successfully calls the Ability#startAssistAbility method, the framework returns the agent object of the peer ability to your application.
    Since:
    7

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      int sendEvent​(InnerEvent event)
      Sends messages to the peer ability.
      void setLifecycleObserver​(ILifecycleObserver lifeObserver)
      Registers a lifecycle callback of the peer ability.
      void setReceivedEventHandler​(EventHandler handler)
      Registers a handler for processing messages from the peer ability.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • setLifecycleObserver

        public void setLifecycleObserver​(ILifecycleObserver lifeObserver)
        Registers a lifecycle callback of the peer ability.

        Passing in null will unregister the lifecycle callback.

        Parameters:
        lifeObserver - Indicates an observer used to receive lifecycle events of the peer ability.
        Since:
        7
        See Also:
        ILifecycleObserver

      • setReceivedEventHandler

        public void setReceivedEventHandler​(EventHandler handler)
        Registers a handler for processing messages from the peer ability.
        Parameters:
        handler - Indicates a handler used to process messages from the peer ability.
        Since:
        7
        See Also:
        EventHandler

      • sendEvent

        public int sendEvent​(InnerEvent event)
        Sends messages to the peer ability.
        Parameters:
        event - Indicates the message to send to the peer ability.
        Returns:
        Returns the message sending result. Returns AssistantCode#OK if the message is sent successfully; returns an error code defined in AssistantCode otherwise.
        Since:
        7
        See Also:
        InnerEvent
